item.title: Running 2 server's at once
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

owner iain:

if you go on the server.java, and click crtl+f then put in the search box 43594, then enter, thats the port, if you change one, to 5555, compile on one of the servers, and its done

I’m sorry but, can you read? It’s already been answered. And I figured it out after Davidi2 said it was in Server.java.

Thanks anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Running 2 server's at once
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

[quote=“magekid990, post:13, topic:357804”]It kinda seems you want two world on your server so I have a trick I use. MAke a portal somewere at make it so it teleports you to a diffrent hight level cause on a 508+ hight is
0 = ground
1 = Floating
2 = Even higher Floating
3 = EVEN HIGHER FLOATING
4 = Pvp
5 = Same as 0 but no npcs or anything
so you can make the portal set level to 5 and add npcs and other st00f at hight level 5[/quote]

Thanks for your help but I am doing a 317, plus my question’s already been answered. Thanks anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Running 2 server's at once
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:
@magekid990 wrote:

It kinda seems you want two world on your server so I have a trick I use. MAke a portal somewere at make it so it teleports you to a diffrent hight level cause on a 508+ hight is
0 = ground
1 = Floating
2 = Even higher Floating
3 = EVEN HIGHER FLOATING
4 = Pvp
5 = Same as 0 but no npcs or anything
so you can make the portal set level to 5 and add npcs and other st00f at hight level 5

Read full topic

item.title: Running 2 server's at once
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

[quote=“ameer122, post:11, topic:357804”]you mean world1 world2

yes you can there are rsps name emps-scape

have world1 / world2

and you get same skills items in your accounts if you go world1 world2

like runescape[/quote]

My question has already been answered, and yes, I already knew it was possible. I just needed to know how. David helped me with that, and now I know.

Read full topic

item.title: Running 2 server's at once
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:9, topic:357804”][quote author=Word Life link=topic=454316.msg3327828#msg3327828 date=1283243707]

Actually, you can run 2 servers on your computer, by having the second one run on a different port than the first.

Yes, that’s what I stated above. But the question is, how do I make a server run on a different port?

P.S - I already have the 2nd Port open, so that’s 1 step closer.
[/quote]You change the port in either Server.java or Run.bat[/quote]

Ohh, I see. Thanks.

Read full topic
